review: Hello, This is Balaji Yelde, a year ago my father was suffering from severe pain in his leg (thigh Bone)and then consultant Dr. Rajeev Reddy he diagnose him with NON-HODGKIN'S LYMPHOMA B-CELL TYPE(NHL B CELL TYPE) Dr. Rajeev Reddy Very Professional with a very wealth experience of treating ONCOLOGY-ORTHO-PATIENTS, he was very well guided us through the process of treatment very well, he treated my father who is 78 years old with perfect diagnosis and today because of him my father back to the normal routine of life he is able to walk by his own without any kind of support,  walking longer without a stick and also able to climb the stairs as well now relatively comfortable, when we compared both the X rays previous and post-treatment its shows positive sign of treatment. We strongly recommend Dr. Rajeev Reddy Guru for any ORTHO- ONCOLOGY CASES ** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** **** very soft person and down to earth unlike others. GOD Bless Him for his service towards humanity.
